title: Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds step out for the first time since welcoming third baby
text:
Blake Lively has recently welcomed baby number three with husband Ryan Reynolds, announcing the new addition earlier this month.

And it appears that the parents-of-three have finally been able to enjoy some adult time since the birth.

The couple was spotted out Tuesday for the first time since Blake give birth, as they made their way home from brunch in New York City.

Mom and dad: Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds were spotted out Tuesday for the first time since giving birth to their third child, as they made their way home from brunch in New York City

Lively dressed for fall in an open grey top coat with a black and white wide gingham scarf draped around her neck.

The 32-year-old wore the jacket over a long loose-fitting navy blue v-neck blouse with a pleated bib.

She complemented the top with some skintight black leggings and a classic pair of white sneakers.

The Simple Favor star finished the ensemble with a chunky knit olive green beanie, which hid her hair.

Autumn chic: Lively dressed for fall in an open grey top coat with a black and white wide gingham scarf draped around her neck

Cool mom: The 32-year-old wore the jacket over a long loose-fitting navy blue v-neck blouse with a pleated bib

Leggy display: She complemented the top with some skintight black leggings and a classic pair of white sneakers

Beanie season: The Simple Favor star finished the ensemble with a chunky knit olive green beanie, which hid her hair

Arm in arm: She locked arms with Reynolds as they crossed the street to their apartment, escaping the nippy New York autumn air

She locked arms with Reynolds as they crossed the street to their apartment, escaping the nippy New York autumn air.

He also kept warm in a puffy blue down vest buttoned to the top, featuring a built-in grey hood.

It was paired with a lighter blue button-down shirt, which he wore with the sleeves rolled up.

The 43-year-old actor wore the look with some slim grey slacks and a pair of white sneakers.

Puffy vest: He also kept warm in a puffy blue down vest buttoned to the top, featuring a built-in grey hood

Cool kicks: The 43-year-old wore the look with some slim grey slacks and a pair of white sneakers

Represent: He finished the ensemble with a black baseball cap from his company Aviation American Gin, some black prescription glasses and a matching wristwatch

Adult time: It appears that the parents-of-three have finally been able to enjoy some adult time since the birth, which was announced earlier this month

He finished the ensemble with a black baseball cap from his company Aviation American Gin, some black prescription glasses and a matching wristwatch.

The Deadpool star recently appeared to announce the baby's sex when he posted their first family photo.

Referencing climate policy in British Columbia, he wrote in the caption: 'I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in.'
description: Reynolds recently appeared to announce the baby's sex when he posted their first family photo: 'I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in.'
